backend/main.mo: Main actor for the AstCloud backend, handling user profiles, orders (submit/retrieve), payment processing via Stripe, and access control using role-based authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Data migration module that upgrades existing orders from OldAstCloudOrder (without buyerInfo) to NewAstCloudOrder (with buyerInfo), defaulting firstName and lastName to 'unknown'.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three implemented features: adding First/Last Name fields to the order form, removing the login/logout button from the header, and adding a contact email mailto link to the footer.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated summary file describing the purpose and recent changes of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining light and dark mode CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens, borders, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets the page title to 'Furever Keepsakes and Memorials - Pet Memorials' and mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application component that sets up TanStack Router routes, renders the main marketing page layout, handles Internet Identity authentication, and shows a profile setup modal for new users.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Renders the site footer with branding, quick navigation links, copyright info, a caffeine.ai attribution, and a contact email address.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Sticky navigation header with a logo and smooth-scroll nav links for About, Designs, Order, and Process sections, including a mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Marketing section describing the three key features of the resin memorials: crystal-clear resin, natural botanical elements, and embedded printed photographs.
Hero section with headline copy, tagline, description, CTA buttons to scroll to Designs or Process, and a featured product image.
Four-step process section explaining how each memorial is made: photo selection, professional printing, botanical placement, and resin pour/cure.
Grid showcase of four available resin memorial shapes (Square, Heart, Hexagon, Headstone), each with a product image, pet name, badge, and description.
Order submission form that collects pet details, a photo upload, buyer/contact info, and shipping address, then submits the order via a mutation hook with Internet Identity authentication and Stripe payment selection.
frontend/src/components/payment/PaymentF: Displays a payment failure page with an error message and buttons to retry or return home, wrapped in the site's Header and Footer.
frontend/src/components/payment/PaymentM: Renders a radio group UI for selecting between Stripe (credit/debit card) and PayPal payment methods.
frontend/src/components/payment/PaymentS: Shows an admin-only UI (fixed alert + dialog) for configuring Stripe by entering a secret key and allowed countries, only visible when Stripe is not yet configured.
Displays a payment success confirmation page with a thank-you message and a button to return home, wrapped in the site's Header and Footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing login, logout, and identity persistence via DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile, order submission, order retrieval, Stripe configuration, admin checks, and checkout session creation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global CSS including Google Fonts imports, Tailwind directives, and a warm-neutral CSS custom property theme for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear those values using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors (using oklch variables), fonts, border radii, animations, and enabling the typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking the All4Fun Florida Order Form site's version, architectural notes, completed features (name fields, login removal, contact email), and pending feature requests.
